playing the waiting game with Camp America as my application is sent out. realising I have zero patience & feel anxious about it everyday
why are swim memberships in Edinburgh so expensive? I just wanna swimmm 🏊🏻‍♀️
kicking my hungover butt to the gym tonight and couldn't be more proud of myself. so much gin, so many regrets.

rly wanna brainstorm and get inspired with a final project idea but this dissertation is filling in every available space in my brain

second face mask of the evening and I couldn't even tell you what number of mini chocolate chip muffin I'm on #snackcentral
@lollipopmegan_ remember when all we used to do was watch movies and eat strawberry pencils? I miss those days.
hitting Sainsbury's at 8pm for snacks is an essential stage of dissertation writing.
@Humankaz1 nope! been hit hard by this cold 🤧
sitting at my dining table, lemsip in hand, trying desperately not to pull my own hair out from the stress of this dissertation. #sos
this year I want to read a lot more poetry and embrace every single thing that I feel without worry of being judged 🌸 #newyear #betterme

trying to scrape together every inch of motivation I have to write this dissertation today but August Rush is on film 4 so maybe not..
listening to Careless Whisper at the train station. not sure if I want to burst out into song or tears
@ailsamontgomery it's for my poor wee skin, think it's the caffeine that's making it so bad 💔 imma struggle!

switching to decaf and drinking a hella lot more water is my plan for 2017... I fear as a caffeine addict this may be difficult

snuggled on the couch, little prince sleeping in my arms, the Christmas bake off on and it's snowing outside. A very happy Boxing Day indeed
